text: George M. Martin, M.D. (born June 30, 1927, in New York City, died December 17, 2022) was an American biogerontologist. He received both his B.S. in Chemistry and his M.D. from the University of Washington and has been a member of its faculty since 1957. Martin was a Professor Emeritus in the Department of Pathology, Professor of Genome Sciences and Director Emeritus of the University of Washingtonâ€™s Alzheimer's Disease Research Center.Alzheimer's Disease Research Center at the University of Washington ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:University of Washington faculty Category:Scientists from New York City Category:Pathologists
title: George M. Martin
